item.title: Teaching
item.description: Short courses and workshops Data Carpentry Social Sciences January 25-26, 2019, Arlington, Virginia, USA Data Carpentry Genomics September 15-16, 2018, Rolla, Missouri, USA Preparing to teach statistics (instructor) Spring 2018 Topic models for computational text analysis Summer 2016, Fall 2013 Formal courses Educating a diverse nation (co-facilitator) Spring 2017 (in-person) & Fall 2017 (online) Introductory statistics (instructor of record) Fall 2016, Spring 2016, Fall 2015, Summer 2015, Spring 2015, Fall 2014, Spring 2014
